title: Ticket #7786: Add tool to shut down + resume condor_dagman and provisioner jobs
description:
We want tools that will allow us to shut down and then later resume provisioner jobs (as per #7600), as well as condor_dagman jobs.

This is different from removing a condor job using condor_rm. Removing a job implies that the job is finished. However when we shut down a job, we assume that we'll want to resume that job at a later point, picking up from the state where it left off.

We'll need to make new tools for this feature, presumably called condor_shutdown and condor_resume.

This work is described in detail in a design document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O1dcSDclEp_gN5IkHza4TKtkjT5nJCjYveD1IA-hnfs/edit#
